# Program

-	Go to program menu showing program list page. There is default showing 10 rows. 

<img src="../../admin/program-list.png" />

-	When we need to add program click Add program button. Now showing Add program page.

<img src="../../admin/add-program.png" />

-	Enter valid program details and click submit button.

-	Once program created successfully return to program page. This created program showing in the list.

<img src="../../admin/program-list1.png" />

-	Anything actions needed in the program list use action column edit icon and delete icon.
-	Edit icon use to update the program details.
-	Delete icon used to delete this program. This program disabled. Also disabled this program course also disabled. 

### REST API

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Program List**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "paginate": {
                "offset": 0,
                "limit": 10,
                "sort": {
                    "key": false,
                    "sortKey": "",
                    "sortType": true
                },
                "search": {
                    "key": false,
                    "searchKey": "all",
                    "searchValue": ""
                },
                "institute": "all"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: ProgramListRequest) {\n  getProgramList(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Create Program**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "body": {
                "instituteId": "652fbc52be58f3ae55b5a89d",
                "programName": "Digital Information",
                "programCode": "001",
                "duration": "One Month",
                "status": 1
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: CreateProgramRequest) {\n  createProgram(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Get Program ById**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fc49777d44ebded0d34c4"
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: GetProgramByIdRequest) {\n  getProgramById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Update Program**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fc49777d44ebded0d34c4",
            "body": {
                "_id": "652fc49777d44ebded0d34c4",
                "instituteId": "652fbc52be58f3ae55b5a89d",
                "programName": "Digital Information",
                "programCode": "001",
                "duration": "One Month",
                "createdBy": "652fb7953bb12d581a57b480",
                "status": 1,
                "createdAt": "2023-10-18T11:42:16.452Z",
                "updatedAt": "2023-10-18T11:42:16.452Z",
                "__v": 0
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: UpdateProgramRequest) {\n  updateProgram(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Delete Program**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "640adae8792e7f9a9148ac91"
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: DeleteProgramByIdRequest) {\n  deleteProgramById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>
